product.title: Donald Duck Buys a House | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Donald Duck Buys a House

Since his debut in 1934, Walt Disney’s Donald Duck has captivated the hearts and imaginations of young readers across the world. In this fun-loving tale, Donald is excited to purchase a new home, only to be repeatedly irritated by his new upstairs neighbors, chipmunks Chip and Dale. Through the escapades that ensue, Donald eventually realizes the value of patience and friendship.

Tie-in Activity: Teach your child the importance of being a good neighbor by doing something kind for someone who lives nearby, such as baking cookies, offering to help shovel a walkway, or just stopping to say hello during an afternoon stroll.
